sentence.idiomatic: There are so many people, I don't know why she only likes him either.
Such a major thing happened, it was only her that we couldn't get in touch with.
I would like to forget her...it's just that my whole mind is filled with traces of her.
He is a very distrustful person, so he almost has no friends.
I never realized that after not seeing each other for a few years, she had become that distrustful.
He said he really couldn't take his girlfriend's suspicious nature.
I didn't do this--why would I have a guilty conscience?
Every time, as soon as we talk about this matter, she feels very guilty.
Immediately upon seeing his manner I knew he had a guilty conscience.
His two-timing was discovered by his girlfriend.
You already have a boyfriend. You can't cheat on him.
It never occurred to her that her boyfriend would cheat on her.
I admit that this time I am wrong. Don't be angry, all right?
He doesn't dare to admit that he has done wrong. We all despise him.
During this interview, this movie star admitted his love affair for the first time.
I have never met such a shameless person before.
How can he do such a thing--he really has no shame.
We all don't dare to believe that in the world there could be such a shameless person.
He thinks that when you are in love you don't need to be wide-awake.
Wake up a bit, don't be deceived by her.
After hearing that many people's advice he still hasn't woken up.
Lili, you've finally answered the phone!
What is it?
I have been calling you non-stop for two days, have sent countless text messages, how come you are ignoring me? Do you know how worried I have been?
You have time to worry? If I'm not wrong, you should be busy calling your new girlfriend now...sending her messages, not me.
Lili, how can you still misunderstand me? I told you before, she is just my colleague. That day we just happened to be working overtime together. When you called me, my cell phone battery was dead.
Your battery was dead? Who do you think you are fooling? In the entire time we've known each other, why is it only that day your cell phone battery died?

How can you be so unreasonable? How many times have I told you, we were working overtime that day. Whether you believe me or not, that's up to you. In any case you women are all just overly suspicious.
Humph. You finally have a guilty conscience. I most despise these kind of two-timing men who won't come clean like you.
Who's the one two-timing? You think I don't know about you and Liu Xiang? I don't have a career, don't have money, I don't have anything at all. Why don't you go live happily ever after with him!

word.literal: to be unable to compare with
to be out of one's mind

sentence.idiomatic: You have no shame! Yes, you definitely can't compete with him! I truly must have been out of my mind to go out with you.
Fine, we both should wake up. Let's break up!
If you want to break up--fine then, let's break up. You're the one who said it.

word.literal: not own a thing in the world
